Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses rerouted SB: Grand, LaSalle, Wacker & State; NB State, Wacker, Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks & Illinois: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kinzie/State.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, LaSalle, Wacker and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois.

Allow extra travel time.
